name: ext_R2_AuditEvent_event
title: Cross-version Extension for R2.AuditEvent.event for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents AuditEvent.event from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/AuditEvent|1.0.2 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.definition: Identifies the name, action type, time, and disposition of the audited event.
element.comment: `AuditEvent` maps to R4B `AuditEvent`. So is mapped as Equivalent.

constraint.human: All FHIR elements must have a @value or children unless an empty Parameters resource
constraint.expression: hasValue() or (children().count() > id.count()) or $this is Parameters

constraint.human: Must have either extensions or value[x], not both

element.definition: Unique id for the element within a resource (for internal references). This may be any string value that does not contain spaces.

slicing.description: Extensions are always sliced by (at least) url

element.definition: May be used to represent additional information that is not part of the basic definition of the element. element.definition: Identifier for a family of the event.  For example, a menu item, program, rule, policy, function code, application name or URL. It identifies the performed function.
element.comment: `AuditEvent` maps to R4B `AuditEvent`. So is mapped as Equivalent.
